title: Mario Fernandez (boxer)
text:
Mario Fernandez (born July 13, 1993) is a Filipino <a href="boxer">boxer</a>, who competes in the <a href="Bantamweight">Bantamweight</a> division. He represented the Philippines at the <a href="2014%20Asian%20Games">2014 Asian Games</a> and won the bronze medal in the event. Fernandez is a <a href="Left-handed">southpaw</a> and a technical fighter with good footwork, speed and has a decent power in both hands.
Mario Fernandez is a multiple medalist of the <a href="South%20East%20Asian%20Games">South East Asian Games</a> boxing Event in the Bantamweight Division.
